entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
